alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 8:59PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A group of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Otero, northwestern Baca, northeastern Las Animas, southeastern Crowley and Bent Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 858 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over portions of eastern Otero, northwestern Baca, northeastern Las Animas, southeastern Crowley and Bent Counties, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Las Animas, Swink, Cheraw, McClave, Higbee, Hasty, John Martin Reservoir, Fort Lyon and Caddoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
